# List of attacks on mosques in the United Kingdom

Islamophobia in the United Kingdom has manifested in many violent attacks on Muslim institutions such as mosques and cultural centres. In 2022 a report by Muslim Engagement and Development found that about 42% of mosques in the United Kingdom experienced religiously motivated attacks in the preceeding three years. Between July and October 2025, 25 mosques were attacked.
